price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߏߕߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߘߊߎ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ߓߊ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߬ ߠߊ߫
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
